resources.string: Canberra is the capital of Australia.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Lake Baikal is the world`s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
The longest river in Russia is Lena.
The UN headquarters is located in New York.
Sicily is washed by the Mediterranean Sea.
The capital of Ireland is Dublin.
Atlas is a mountain range located in Europe.
In China, despite its impressive size, there is only one time zone.
The Mayan pyramids of the city of Chichen Itza are located in Peru.
Reykjavik is the capital of Iceland.
The coldest point in the world, where people constantly live, is the Russian village of Oymyakon.
Ukraine is the largest country entirely within Europe.
The German Empire is the same as the Third Reich.
The Caspian Sea is the saltiest lake in the world.
Most Belgians live in the countryside.
In the Baltic countries, not a single woman was elected to the presidency.
Andorra is the only principality in the world.
The name of the state of Belgium comes from the name of an ancient tribe.
Inside Italy are two independent states.
There are no countries in Europe that are landlocked.
There are no parks in Dublin.
San Marino claims to be the world`s oldest sovereign state.
UK is the only European country with left-hand traffic.
Scotland has a very hot climate.
The biggest Irish church is located in Dublin.
Not a single woman is buried in the Paris Pantheon.
There are almost no factories and plants in Belgium.
Naples is the largest city in Italy.
There is a city in England whose name contains an exclamation point (!).
Sweden is the smallest Scandinavian country.
Switzerland did not take part in the Second World War
Previously, the Korean peninsula was under Japanese control.
Vietnam won the war with the United States thanks to the population
Are you sure you want to do this?
Difficult questions are available to you
Quiz – is a true–false quest, which initially has basic questions with the possibility of adding your own, answering which you earn points 1–100.

After clicking on the name of the quest, you go to the stage of passing, which consists of 2 parts (easy questions and difficult ones). Initially, you go through easy questions, which can earn a maximum of 83.3% (2 stars), if you score 2 stars – for the next passage of the quest, you will answer difficult questions with which you can score 83.3 – 100% (2–3 stars)

Quests can also be deleted - by clicking on the trash can, with a pop-up window with confirmation, as well as the ability not to delete the questions themselves from the database (We recommend checking the box - delete all questions)
You can also share quests, with or without answers, depending on whether you check the box, difficult questions will be marked with a *. (Basic questions do not show answers if you share them)

Near the button with the name of the quest there is an indicator that indicates the difficulty of the questions after pressing it, it can have 2 states, lite question / hard question. Below there are 3 numbers that show: number of easy questions / difficult / number of attempts to pass. Above the stars there are two indications: the left one is the average percentage for all attempts, the right one is best result. The stars show the best result. Date - this is the date the quest was created, the name of the best result is displayed above the date, if it was specified.

When you try to create your own question, you will be prevented by a dialog box in which you must specify the name of the quest, then you indicate the question itself, the answer to it, the difficulty and the next button, and fill in the next question, etc. until you get bored, then press end. Note that end also writes a question.

Has a complex logic, if an answered question is displayed when the application starts - the timer does not start, if you rewind questions and an unanswered question opens - the timer starts, with further rewinding of questions - the timer continues to count even if you are on an answered question, until you answer any of the questions or the timer runs out. If the timer runs out - it answers the current question randomly, if you are on an answered question - it answers the last viewed unanswered question.
In general, the timer starts if you read an unanswered question.

In the future, various school questions and new opportunities will be added. You can also share your questions in the review, the best questions will probably be added to the application. And also, you can support the author with a rating of 5, or remove ads, and you will have everything true ^)
